thread.title: Daimler's tech spending to dampen earnings growth

title: Daimler's tech spending to dampen earnings growth
text:
Daimler's tech spending to dampen earnings growth 9:12pm IST - 01:25 
Daimler's profit growth will be dampened this year by spending on new technologies such as electric and autonomous vehicles as it missed quarterly earnings forecasts and reported a lower margin on its Mercedes-Benz cars. Sonia Legg reports.   
Daimler's profit growth will be dampened this year by spending on new technologies such as electric and autonomous vehicles as it missed quarterly earnings forecasts and reported a lower margin on its Mercedes-Benz cars. Sonia Legg reports.  //reut.rs/2DTD5Dp
